title: Sketchbook Folio, "Four Figures with a Goat, on Clouds, Study after Rubens", 1810–20
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash, over traces of black chalk on white laid paper
inscribed: in pen and brown ink at lower left corner: 33; at upper right corner : Rubens Parigi. On verso: monumento/ del cinque cento; RAVENNA/ 1818; illegible inscription on tomb.
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors

tombstone.epitaph:
Sketchbook Folio, "Four Figures with a Goat, on Clouds, Study after Rubens", 1810–20.
1810–20. Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash, over traces of black chalk on white laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-3502.
